text: @piersmorgan @DominicRaab You've been right on Covid19 from the beginning @piersmorgan, but you are wrong in this tweet - it's already too late I'm afraid. It was too late on March 10th when @CheltenhamRaces went ahead. Lockdown should been provoked last week of Feb.
